title: Skin idea
body:
Hello, 
People in league amino told me to post this here to get more attention -,-
So I did
I have a skin idea for you, riot.
I called it the opposite skin, champion with this skin become the opposite personality of what they used to be.
For example: opposite evelyn will not be a thot anymore, she will be more covered up and ofc she become friendlier
Yeah, that's it
Thanks â˜†

replies.body:
Yes Oriphix, more anime BS is just what we need...
Don't get me wrong, I like some anime, but LoL has no business with that, and it's running rampant.
Fucking lame weeaboo shit.

Why not both?

What you think is lame other people like, what others think is lame you might like. I despise El Tigre Braum, but my partner thinks it's great. It's about appealing to a wide audience right :P

Same applies to Oriphix's comment ofc.

Why would anyone, and I mean anyone buy a skin that covers up champs?
If anything if there was more cool (star guardian) or less clothing people would buy that like hot cakes.
